official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish authorities and protections regarding the transplantation of human fetal tissue.
short_title: Research on Human Fetal Tissue Amendments of 1993

summary.text: Research on Human Fetal Tissue Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize and regulate research on human fetal tissue transplantation without regard to whether the tissue is obtained after a spontaneous or induced abortion or a stillbirth in accordance with State law. Imposes criminal penalties for: (1) transferring such tissue for valuable consideration affecting interstate commerce; or (2) soliciting or receiving a directed donation.

titles.title: Research on Human Fetal Tissue Amendments of 1993
To amend the Public Health Service Act to establish authorities and protections regarding the transplantation of human fetal tissue.
